title: Were 700-Plus Undocumented People, Including Sex Offenders, Caught in El Paso Overnight?
subtitle: Many readers shared stories aggregated from a U.S. Border Patrol press release as proof of the need for a 2,000-mile border wall.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Some 700-plus undocumented migrants, including sex offenders, were apprehended by the U.S. Border Patrol overnight.
